alert.note: Alert for Benson (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Benson County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1030 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pleasant Lake, or 49 miles west of Devils Lake, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pleasant Lake around 1040 PM CDT. Knox around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include York. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
